abstract: The Service Employees International Union, in its most aggressive move yet to criticize the finance industry, has called on Bank of America to remove its chief executive at the bank’s board meeting Wednesday.
snippet: The Service Employees International Union, in its most aggressive move yet to criticize the finance industry, has called on Bank of America to remove its chief executive at the bank’s board meeting Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The Service Employees International Union, in its most aggressive move yet to criticize the finance industry, has called on Bank of America to remove its chief executive at the bank’s board meeting Wednesday.

headline.main: Union Urges BofA to Oust Chief Executive
